findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose parties to significant liability without recourse to recover damages.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability is a standard risk management practice; having no limitations may lead to unforeseen financial exposure.
findings.evidence_quote: No event shall be limited by the limitation of liability clause.

findings.rationale: Without audit rights, a party may be unable to verify compliance or detect breaches of the agreement, increasing risk.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of provisions regarding intellectual property can lead to disputes over ownership and usage of shared information.
